description.en: This scroll allows you to change your character name. Simply double-click the scroll to activate it, then choose a new character name and press OK.
description.ar: This scroll allows you to change your character name. Simply double-click the scroll to activate it, then choose a new character name and press OK.
description.br: Esse pergaminho permite que você mude o nome do seu personagem. Simplesmente dê duplo-clique no pergaminho para ativá-lo e, em seguida, escreva um novo nome para seu personagem e pressione OK.
description.cns: 可以更改玩家名称的卷轴。双击后输入新名称，然后点击确认即可。
description.fi: This scroll allows you to change your character name. Simply double-click the scroll to activate it, then choose a new character name and press OK.
description.fil: This scroll allows you to change your character name. Simply double-click the scroll to activate it, then choose a new character name and press OK.
description.fr: Parchemin permettant de changer le nom de votre personnage.
description.id: Gulir ini memungkinkanmu untuk mengubah nama karaktermu. Cukup klik dua kali gulir untuk mengaktifkannya, lalu pilih nama karakter baru dan tekan OK.
description.it: This scroll allows you to change your character name. Simply double-click the scroll to activate it, then choose a new character name and press OK.
description.jp: 名前を変更する秘術が書かれた巻物。既に使用されている名前は使えません。
description.nl: This scroll allows you to change your character name. Simply double-click the scroll to activate it, then choose a new character name and press OK.
description.pl: This scroll allows you to change your character name. Simply double-click the scroll to activate it, then choose a new character name and press OK.
description.sp: Este pergamino te permite cambiar el nombre de tu personaje. Simplemente haz doble clic en el pergamino para activarlo, luego elije un nuevo nombre para el personaje y presiona OK.
description.sw: This scroll allows you to change your character name. Simply double-click the scroll to activate it, then choose a new character name and press OK.
description.th: scrollนี้ช่วยให้คุณสามารถเปลี่ยนชื่อตัวละครของคุณ เพียงดับเบิลคลิกที่scrollเพื่อเปิดใช้งาน จากนั้นเลือกชื่อตัวละครใหม่ แล้วกด OK
description.tw: 讓玩家變更角色名稱。雙擊右鍵使用，然後重新選擇角色名稱後，按下 OK 即可。
description.vi: Cuộn này cho phép bạn thay đổi tên nhân vật của mình. Chỉ cần nhấp đúp vào cuộn để kích hoạt nó, sau đó chọn tên nhân vật mới và nhấn OK.
